actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 87 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that Members of Congress may elect at retirement partial (in lieu of full) conversion from group life insurance to individual life insurance.

summary.text: Allows Members of Congress to elect, upon retirement, conversion from group life insurance to an individual life insurance policy, not to exceed 75 percent of the life insurance in force immediately before retirement.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 87 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that Members of Congress may elect at retirement partial (in lieu of full) conversion from group life insurance to individual life insurance.
